snippet: Mr. Schiff, whose rocketing, flat forehand propelled him to national and world table tennis championships in the 1930s when he was in his teens, later became an ardent advocate for his sport.
abstract: Sol Schiff, ardent advocate of table tennis who was a champion as a teenager in the 1930s, dies at age 94.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Schiff, whose rocketing, flat forehand propelled him to national and world table tennis championships in the 1930s when he was in his teens, later became an ardent advocate for his sport.

headline.seo: Sol Schiff, ‘Mr. Table Tennis,’ Dies at 94
headline.main: Sol Schiff, ‘Mr. Table Tennis,’ Dies at 94
headline.print_headline: Sol Schiff, 94, Known as Mr. Table Tennis
